description: Start at Johnston Canyon trail. Wide and popular trail; continue beyond lower and upper falls, towards Paint Pots. Beyond Paint pots, trail enters a wide valley, with open meadows. Outstanding views through meadow section before heading back into the trees and continuing to climb. Very gradual ascent until reaching Luellen Lake juntion. Follow sign to the right, continue for another 1-2 kms before reaching the lake and campsite. Luellen lake is a spectacular setting along the Sawback trail.
directions: On Bow Valley Parkway, begin at Johston Canyon parking lot (alternative start at Moose Meadows trailhead). Parking can be busy in the summer, 'ROAM' public transit services from Banff town
title: Johnston Canyon to Luellen Lake - Sawback - Day 1
